paper_abstract: We consider in this paper the class M (n)(k) supercript stop of generalized Motzkin paths of length n, that is, lattice paths using steps (1,1), (1,-1), (k,0), where k is a fixed positive integer, starting at the origin (0,0), running above the x-axis, and ending at (n,0). The area is the region bounded by the path and the x-axis. We first establish a bijection between the area of paths in M-k(n) supercript stop and some lattice paths of length n+1. Then, by using a rejection technique, we obtain a linear algorithm with an average time complexity (k mod 2 +1)(n+1).
paper_title: Non uniform random generation of generalized Motzkin paths
